subtitle.new_password: Please enter and confirm your new password

name.maxLength: Name must be less than 15 characters.
name.minLength: Name must be greater than 3 characters.

password.minLength: Password must be greater than {{ minLength }} characters.
password.noAlphanumeric: Password must contain at least one special character.
password.noLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password.noNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
password.noUppercase: Password must contain at least uppercase letter.
password.whitespace: Password has white space on start or end.

terms.required: Accept terms of service is required.

hint.password: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase, lowercase, number and non aplhanumeric.
